text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/0cb5bcf5836de83f7d64fb01d3ce708caacaf66c|patch 8.2.1023: Vim9: redefining a function uses a new index every time>
patch 8.2.1023: Vim9: redefining a function uses a new index every time

Problem:    Vim9: redefining a function uses a new index every time.
Solution:   When redefining a function clear the contents and re-use the
            index.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1023: Vim9: redefining a function uses a new index every time · vim/vim@0cb5bcf
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1023: Vim9: redefining a function uses a new index every time · vim/vim@0cb5bcf
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: redefining a function uses a new index every time. Solution: When redefining a function clear the contents and re-use the index.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a3b7fdc1bb227897f41b8f2958a48d0a26292ff7|patch 8.2.1026: Vim9: cannot break the line after "->">
patch 8.2.1026: Vim9: cannot break the line after "->"

Problem:    Vim9: cannot break the line after "->".
Solution:   Check for a continuation line after "->", "[" and ".".  Ignore
            trailing white space.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1026: Vim9: cannot break the line after "->" · vim/vim@a3b7fdc
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1026: Vim9: cannot break the line after "->" · vim/vim@a3b7fdc
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot break the line after &quot;->&quot;. Solution: Check for a continuation line after &quot;->&quot;, &quot;[&quot; and &quot;.&quot;. Ignore trailing whi...

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/820ffa567c5a4bc0d3517c79c91d63d8062c358e|patch 8.2.1027: GUI: multi-byte characters do not work in a terminal>
patch 8.2.1027: GUI: multi-byte characters do not work in a terminal

Problem:    GUI: multi-byte characters do not work in a terminal.
Solution:   Do not assume a key is one byte. (closes #6304)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1027: GUI: multi-byte characters do not work in a terminal · vim/vim@820ffa5
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1027: GUI: multi-byte characters do not work in a terminal · vim/vim@820ffa5
attachments.text: Problem: GUI: multi-byte characters do not work in a terminal. Solution: Do not assume a key is one byte. (closes #6304)
